subject: Football
Concussions
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: After suffering a concussion during a 31-0 rout over the Browns on Sunday, the Steelers’ Ben Roethlisberger may be ready to play in the team’s A.F.C. game in mid January.
snippet: After suffering a concussion during a 31-0 rout over the Browns on Sunday, the Steelers’ Ben Roethlisberger may be ready to play in the team’s A.F.C. game in mid January.
